revised_title: Covariant Theory of Strong Interaction Symmetries and Higher Meson Representations
tldr: The authors develop a covariant theory of strong interaction symmetries, focusing on the relativistic structure of meson multiplets, including spin 2 particles. They provide expressions for free Lagrangians, free propagators, and interaction Lagrangians for higher-order calculations. The study includes the 4212 and 5940 meson multiplets, which may contain some of the recently discovered resonances.
